title: Rigged & Basketball (with Tone Bell)
itunes:title: Rigged & Basketball (with Tone Bell)
description:
Is the NBA rigged? Langston and guest Tone Bell (Can't Cancel This on Showtime) make a slam dunk on this conspiracy theory and get to the bottom of who and what's at stake during these games.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Langston Kerman, Tone Bell, Bust Down, Can't Cancel This, Showtime, Basketball, NBA, NBA Rigged, Rigged League, David Stern, NBA Commissioner, Chris Paul, Professional Basketball, Men Talking Sports, Black Conspiracy Theories, LeBron James, Golden State Warriors, New Orleans, Hurricane Katrina, National Basketball League
